name: Simpolony
description:
The Game:

"Simpolony" is a fast-paced single-player RTS game that puts you in charge of a flying city. In a post-apocalyptic world where humankind has been defeated by artificial intelligence, you must use your strategic skills to gather resources, build and upgrade structures, and defend against endless waves of enemies. As the commander of "Simpolony," you hold the fate of the survivors in your hands and must work tirelessly to protect them and secure their future.

Join the fight for survival and defend your colony today!

Made for the Game Dev Field Guide Monthly Game Jam 22

Controls:

The in-game controls can be accessed by pressing the "?" icon in the bottom right corner. Additionally:

  • [ESC]: Open the menu (options include Restart, Quit, and Mouse Sensitivity)
  • [WASD]/[Arrow Keys]: Move the camera
  • Hold [RMB]: Move the camera
  • [Spacebar]: Recenters the camera
  • [Del]: Destroys selected building
  • [LMB]: Selects a building
  • [RMB]: Deselects a building/Cancels construction
